name: Paw Bois
description:
A small, cute game about the journey of the two Paw Bois.

Follow along while they venture home.

CONTROLS:

Boi 1:
The [A] and [D] keys move the Boi left and right.
With the [S] key the boi can grab and jump after releasing the key.

Boi 2:
Use the [left] and [right] arrow keys to maneuver left and right.
The [down] arrow key is used to grab onto ledges and jump afterwards.
